page.title: 13Emergency Service Hungerford
page.content: Hungerford Fire Station is manned by 13 firemen who attend an average 4 calls per week.The largest fire of recent times was at a local saw mill where damage was in excess of Â£1m.A new fire engine costs approximately Â£65,000 and can hold 400 gallons of water. The Hungerford Ambulance Service has six men and women.This crew can be sent anywhere in Berkshire.The shifts are 10 hours long.90% of the work is out patients with 10% emergencies, mainly collapses and road traffic accidents. Hungerford Police Station is manned by 15 officers working 8 hour shifts. They have 3 cars and 1 bicycle to cover an area of 120 square miles in which the crime rate has increased over the past 5 years.
